sentences.sentence: Its catchment area extended to the mountains around Seoul.
sentences.translation: 运河蓄水区一直延伸到了首尔周围的山区。

sentences.sentence: “It depends on the store level and the catchment area,” he says.
sentences.translation: 他指出：“类型要取决于商店的等级以及其所服务地区的情况。”

sentences.sentence: "It depends on the store level and the catchment area," he says.
sentences.translation: 他指出：“类型要取决于商店的等级以及其所服务地区的情况。”
